text: BlackRock, Vanguard, and State Street are commonly referred to as the “Big Three” (or “Giant Three”) in the context of index-fund and institutional ownership concentration.
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: They run massive index funds and frequently appear among the largest institutional holders across many large U.S. public companies because broad index products must hold constituents at scale.
evidence:
Evidence (primary verification paths):
- Vanguard 13F filings (SEC EDGAR): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=102909&type=13F-HR&count=40&owner=exclude
- BlackRock 13F filings (SEC EDGAR): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1364742&type=13F-HR&count=40&owner=exclude
- State Street 13F filings (SEC EDGAR): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=93751&type=13F-HR&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: For Comcast (CMCSA), you can verify major holders through its proxy “beneficial ownership” table and through SC 13G filings on SEC EDGAR.
evidence:
Evidence:
- Comcast SEC EDGAR company page (CIK 0001166691): https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=1166691
- Comcast proxies (DEF 14A listing): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1166691&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
- Comcast SC 13G filings (institutional holders): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1166691&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: For Disney (DIS), you can verify major holders through its proxy “beneficial ownership” table and through SC 13G filings on SEC EDGAR.
evidence:
Evidence:
- The Walt Disney Company SEC EDGAR company page (CIK 0001744489): https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=1744489
- Disney proxies (DEF 14A listing): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1744489&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
- Disney SC 13G filings (institutional holders): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1744489&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: If you want a clean “combined %” number for Disney (Vanguard + BlackRock + State Street), compute it from the latest proxy beneficial owners table (and confirm with SC 13G filings if needed).
evidence:
Evidence:
- Disney proxies (DEF 14A listing): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1744489&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
- Disney SC 13G filings: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1744489&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: For Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD), you can verify major holders through its proxy beneficial ownership table and through SC 13G filings on SEC EDGAR.
evidence:

- WBD SEC EDGAR company page (CIK 0001437107): https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=1437107

section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: Fox Corporation’s voting control structure can be verified in its proxy statement / annual filing disclosures on SEC EDGAR.
evidence:
Evidence:
- Fox SEC EDGAR company page (CIK 0001754301): https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=1754301
- Fox proxies (DEF 14A listing): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1754301&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: For Fox’s traded shares, large institutions (including Big Three firms) can be checked through Fox’s proxy beneficial owners table and through SC 13G filings on SEC EDGAR.
evidence:
Evidence:
- Fox SC 13G filings: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1754301&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
- Fox proxies (DEF 14A listing): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1754301&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: Sinclair’s ownership / voting control disclosures can be verified through its proxy statement on SEC EDGAR.
evidence:
Evidence:
- Sinclair SEC EDGAR company page (CIK 0000912752): https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=912752
- Example Sinclair proxy statement (SEC-hosted): https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/912752/000091275221000031/proxystmt-def2020def14a.htm
- Sinclair proxies (DEF 14A listing): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=912752&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: Sinclair major institutional holders can be checked via its proxy beneficial owners table and via SC 13G filings on SEC EDGAR.
evidence:
Evidence:
- Sinclair SC 13G filings: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=912752&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
- Sinclair proxies (DEF 14A listing): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=912752&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: Across many large U.S. public companies (including major media parents), Vanguard and BlackRock often appear near the top of institutional holders, with State Street frequently also near the top.
evidence:
Evidence (primary verification paths):
- SEC EDGAR 13F filings:
  - Vanguard: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=102909&type=13F-HR&count=40&owner=exclude
  - BlackRock: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1364742&type=13F-HR&count=40&owner=exclude
  - State Street: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=93751&type=13F-HR&count=40&owner=exclude
- Company-level SC 13G pages (examples from this section):
  - Comcast: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1166691&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
  - Disney: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1744489&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
  - WBD: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1437107&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
  - Fox: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1754301&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
  - Sinclair: https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=912752&type=SC%2013G&count=40&owner=exclude
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: Dual-class or controlled-company structures can let insiders retain voting control even when large institutional investors hold significant economic ownership.
evidence:
Evidence:
- Fox proxies (control disclosures): https://www.sec.gov/cgi-bin/browse-edgar?action=getcompany&CIK=1754301&type=DEF%2014A&count=40&owner=exclude
- Example Sinclair proxy statement (controlled company / voting power): https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/912752/000091275221000031/proxystmt-def2020def14a.htm
- Ownership vs control context: https://corpgov.law.harvard.edu/2019/06/14/the-big-three-power-and-why-it-matters/
section_label: 2. Ownership layer: Big Three and legacy media

text: •   National Guardsman Sarah Beckstrom was killed and National Guardsman Andrew Wolfe was seriously injured in what prosecutors described as an ambush-style shooting in Washington, D.C.; the suspect, Rahmanullah Lakanwal, later faced a federal complaint adding firearm-related counts tied to transporting (including a stolen) firearm across state lines, moving the case into U.S. District Court where capital punishment can be considered.
evidence:
DATE: 2025-11-26
TITLE: Ambush-style shooting of National Guardsmen near Farragut West Metro (Washington, D.C.)
TAGS: national-guard, washington-dc, firearms, immigration, doj, usao-dc, interstate-transport, stolen-firearm
NOTE: DOJ says Beckstrom died 2025-11-27; federal complaint and added firearm-transport counts announced 2025-12-24.
Evidence:
- https://www.justice.gov/usao-dc/pr/afghan-national-charged-murder-national-guard-soldier-sarah-beckstrom
- https://www.justice.gov/usao-dc/pr/new-federal-charges-killing-national-guardsman-sarah-beckstrom-and-shooting-guardsman
